QuestData.Title: The Menders' Stead
QuestData.Description: I don't like the looks of what the Forsaken are doing here at the Bulwark. Bombs, cauldrons, needless bloodshed... none of these embody that which the Argent Crusade stands for. Furthermore, I don't like the fact that they employ mercenaries like yourself.$b$bNothing against you personally, $c. It's just that you could be doing so much more for yourself. If you're interested in healing the plaguelands, rather than re-plaguing them, then report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead to the east.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome, $c. As you can see, our camp is a joint expedition between Argent Crusade members and Cenarion Circle druids, but we welcome all who wish to help heal the land.
